parties: Mclarens Lubricants (Pvt) Ltd,  Vs Commissioner General of Inland Revenue,  Department of Inland Revenue,  -
judgement_by: Hon. M. Sampath K. B. Wijeratne J
keywords: Substantial and procedural provision of law - Amendments - General rule that procedural provisions operate - retrospectively and the substantive provisions operate prospectively under specifically made otherwise - The term exportdefinitions - Marine bunker fuel imported and supplied to ships out of bonded warehouses - Whether and export?
legistation: Article 12 (1), 75 of the Constitution. Section 42 (1), 51, 60 (b) and (c ),106 (1), 163 (5) (a) of the Inland Revenue Act No. 10 of 2006, as amended. Section 16, 22 A (1) and (2) of the Customs Ordinance.  Imports and Exports (Control Act) No. 01 of 1969.
